snippet: A top aide to Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo suggested quotes to executives of two business advocacy groups and won approval to use them in a news release.
abstract: A top aide to Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo suggested quotes to executives of two business advocacy groups and won approval to use them in a news release.

headline.main: Groups' Praise for Cuomo? It Was Written by His Aides
headline.print_headline: Groups’ Praise for Cuomo? It Was Written by His Aides
